#sidebar Navigation

If you're getting errors when you try to run LotRO MIDI Player, you might need to delete Java's temporary internet files.  Follow these instructions to delete them.

  # Open the Java control panel, and under Temporary Internet Files, click Settings...
    http://i4.photobucket.com/albums/y123/digero/lotro/java_del_temp_files_1.png
  # In the dialog that pops up, click Delete Files...
    http://i4.photobucket.com/albums/y123/digero/lotro/java_del_temp_files_2.png
  # Confirm the prompt to delete the files.
  # Try running LotRO MIDI Player again.
